thread.title: Great stay, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great stay, friendly staff - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TVail77
title: Great stay, friendly staff
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Crown Plaza in February. We have been staying here every year for a family getaway since 2001. We also had exceptional hosts in the bar and restaurant area. Rahi at the bar was especially friendly and attentive. We liked him so much we came back three nights in a row just to be served drinks from him. Thank you!
